title: Amazon Shows How to Be a Business During a Crisis
summary: amazon is hiring 100,000 workers at a time when 10 million people filed for unemployment in just two weeks. it 's hiring 100 ,000 workers , prioritizing the products that people need at a moment when online shopping has surged. jeff bezos is donating $ 100 million to food banks to help people who just lost their jobs and can not afford to feed their kids

title: Facebook Hampers Do-It-Yourself Mask Efforts
summary: facebook 's automated content moderation systems were hampered by the social network 's efforts. facebook has long struggled to distinguish between innocuous and malicious content on its site. facebook banned advertising for such equipment last month , and has taken down nearly all posts related to the sale of safety equipment

title: The Coronavirus Is Hurting Travel, So Greece Has Begun Offering Virtual Tourism

title: A third prototype of SpaceX’s Starship rocket bursts on the test stand
summary: the latest test failure for spacex 's starship is yet another very visible test failure. spacex lost one starship test article in march when the vehicle imploded during a pressure test. another may have been to blame for the failure , though the team will do a data review this morning

title: How NASA and SpaceX plan to launch astronauts in May despite a pandemic
summary: nasa 's mission is moving forward , from the united states of america. nasa administrator jim bridenstine says the agency is going to move forward. he says nasa and spacex are confident that it will launch without a major delay. but he says that if it gets delayed a little bit , we 're going to be ok with that will

title: SpaceX raising over $500 million, double what Elon Musk’s company planned to bring in
summary: in 2019 , spacex raised $ 1. 33 billion across three funding rounds. it 's one of the most valuable private companies in the world. spacex shares rank among the most in demand of any pre - ipo companies. the round is about double the $ 250 million that spacex was looking to raise

title: SpaceX unveils users' guide for giant Starship rocket
summary: spacex just released a users ' guide for the reusable spacecraft. the company is developing a reusable spacecraft to help colonize mars. the guide includes private cabins , large common areas , storage , solar storm shelters and a viewing gallery. prices are not given , however

title: YouTube moves to limit spread of false coronavirus 5G theory
summary: youtube will actively remove videos that breach its policies , it said. content that is simply conspiratorial about 5g mobile communications networks , without mentioning coronavirus , is still allowed on the site. videos that violate these policies are still banned from spreading. vodafone said that two of its own masts , and two it shares with o2 , were targeted

title: What you need to know about Zoom before using the video chat service
summary: zoom is a popular video conferencing system that allows users to join a call for up to 40 minutes. people can also decide whether to join by video or by audio and can even add a virtual background to cover up their real background. the new system offers a great alternative to device - specific competitors like facetime , zoom and zoom
